meaning list.sentence translation: ነቲ ዜና ምስ ሰምዐ ፍሕሽው በለ።

meaning list.meaning: ሰራሕተኛ ቤት ጽሕፈት፣ ናይ ኣእምሮ ስራሕ ዝሰርሕ ሰብ (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: White-collar jobs are becoming more common in urban areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ኣብ ከተማታት ስራሕ ጻዕዳ ቆቢዕ ዝያዳ ልሙድ ይኸውን ኣሎ።

meaning list.meaning: ብዙሕ ወጻኢታት ዝሓትት ግን ከኣ ዘይጠቅም ነገር (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: The stadium turned out to be a white elephant for the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: እቲ ስታድየም ንከተማ ክቡር ግን ከኣ ዘይጠቅም ኢንቨስትመንት ኮይኑ ተረኺቡ።

meaning list.meaning: ዘይጎድእ ወይ ጽቡቕ ዕላማ ዘለዎ ሓሶት (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ስምዒታ ከይጎድእ ኢሉ ቁሩብ ሓሶት ተዛረበ።

meaning list.sentence: The company tried to whitewash the scandal.
meaning list.sentence translation: እቲ ኩባንያ ነቲ ዕንደራ ክሽፍኖ ፈቲኑ።

meaning list.sentence: When they throw a party, they go the whole nine yards with decorations and food.
meaning list.sentence translation: ድግስ ክድርብዩ ከለዉ ስልማትን መግብን ሒዞም ኩሎም ይወጹ።

meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!
meaning list.sentence translation: ብዓቢ ፍናን ናብ ድግስኩም ክመጽእ እየ!

meaning list.meaning: ኣብ መወዳእታ ንዝመጸ ሰብ ዝወሃብ ሽልማት ወይ መዓርግ (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: ኣብዚ ሊግ ናይ መወዳእታ ብምምዝጋብ ናይ ዕንጨይቲ ማንካ ሽልማት ተቐቢሎም።

meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: እዚ ሓድሽ ናይ ጽሬት ፍርያት ፍጹም ይሰርሕ።

meaning list.meaning: ፈጺመ ኣይምገበርኩዎን ወይ ኣብ ኩነታት ኣይምሃለኹን (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing that outfit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ከምኡ ክዳን ፈጺመ ኣይምተኸደንኩን።

meaning list.sentence: They visit the same beach year in, year out.
meaning list.sentence translation: ዓመት ዓመት ኣብ ሓደ ገማግም ባሕሪ ይበጽሑ።

meaning list.sentence: He’s too yellow-bellied to confront his boss.
meaning list.sentence translation: ምስ ሓላፊኡ ክገጥም ኣዝዩ ፈራሕ እዩ።

word: you can't teach an old dog new tricks
phonetic american: juː kænt tiːʧ ən oʊld dɔːɡ nuː trɪks
phonetic british: juː kɑːnt tiːʧ ən əʊld dɒɡ njuː trɪks

meaning list.meaning: ናይ ቀደም ልምዲ ዘለዎ ሰብ ክትቅይሮ ከቢድ እዩ (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He refuses to learn how to use a smartphone; you can’t teach an old dog new tricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ስማርትፎን ከመይ ጌርካ ከም እትጥቀም ምምሃር ይኣቢ፤ ናይ ቀደም ልምድታት ክትቅይር ኣጸጋሚ እዩ።

word: your guess is as good as mine
phonetic american: jʊr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn
phonetic british: jɔːr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn

meaning list.meaning: ኣነ ውን ኣይፈልጥን እየ፡ ክልቲኡ ግምትና ብማዕረ ቅኑዕ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: Why the train is late? Your guess is as good as mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ስለምንታይ እያ እታ ባቡር ደንጉያ፧ ኣነ እውን ኣይፈልጥን እየ።
